Ring of Dwarven Gold

miscellaneous undefined

item id [id]: 413
(unremovable [cursed])

Requires 40E40F to forge (E5F5)

This ring was forged by the Eldest Dwarf. It surpasses every other ring in beauty and craftsmanship. So remarkable was its splendor that the younger brother of the eldest dwarf stole the ring and turned into a monster of greed to protect it. The ring has no powers apart from its maddening beauty.
